scripts.clean-all: pnpm run clean-hardhat && pnpm run clean-wordpress && pnpm run clean-thegraph && pnpm run clean-web && pnpm run clean-common
scripts.install-wordpress: cd wordpress && pnpm install && pnpm run instal
scripts.install-all: pnpm run install-hardhat && pnpm run install-wordpress && pnpm run install-thegraph && pnpm run install-web && pnpm run install-common
scripts.build-all: pnpm run build-hardhat && pnpm run build-wordpress && pnpm run build-thegraph && pnpm run build-web && pnpm run build-common
scripts.check-all: pnpm run check-hardhat && pnpm run check-wordpress && pnpm run check-thegraph && pnpm run check-web && pnpm run check-common
scripts.tests-all: pnpm run tests-hardhat && pnpm run tests-wordpress && pnpm run tests-thegraph && pnpm run tests-web && pnpm run tests-common
scripts.all: pnpm run clean-all && pnpm run install-all && pnpm run build-all && pnpm run check-all && pnpm run tests-all
